channel.title: Webclient error
channel.description:
When i run my webclient and login game i get this null pointer -.-
[code]java.lang.NullPointerException at Class36.method531(Class36.java:115) at Model.method470(Model.java:966) at Player.method452(Player.java:280) at Player.getRotatedModel(Player.java:10) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1436) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1030) at client.method146(client.java:14928) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9996) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10835) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5953) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Webclient error
